snippet: Doodles and selfies from the likes of Johnny Depp, Karl Lagerfeld and Conan O’Brien crowd the pages of the guest book of Hôtel du Cap-Eden-Roc in Cannes.
lead_paragraph: Doodles and selfies from the likes of Johnny Depp, Karl Lagerfeld and Conan O’Brien crowd the pages of the guest book of Hôtel du Cap-Eden-Roc in Cannes.
